widget.name: mood gradient
widget.description:
Moods are weird beings. They are hard to describe. Words are not precise. But colors are.
Gradients are filling the space between my defined moodstates and show the transitions of my mood. I can fill one screen a day and scroll down to see my history.
1. I set the color of my present 2. On the screen we see how my day has been going so far 3. If you scroll down, you can see my entire moodhistory
widget.author: Rita Eperjesi
